fracture_analysis_kit_qgis_tools module¶

fracture_analysis_kit_qgis_tools.df_to_gdf(df, coord_system)¶

Converts pandas DataFrame to a GeoDataFrame along with setting the given coordinate system.

Parameters

  • df (pandas.DataFrame) – Pandas DataFrame with QGIS vector layer data.

  • coord_system – Given coordinate system.

Returns

Converted GeoDataFrame

Return type

geopandas.GeoDataFrame

fracture_analysis_kit_qgis_tools.layer_to_df(layer)¶

Converts QGIS vector layer to a pandas DataFrame and extracts coordinate system from the layer.

Parameters

layer (TODO: Why doesnt type() work?) – QGIS vector layer.

Returns

Converted pandas DataFrame and layer coord system.

Rtypes

pandas.DataFrame and crs

fracture_analysis_kit_qgis_tools.layer_to_gdf(layer)¶

Converts QGIS vector layer to a GeoDataFrame.

Parameters

layer (TODO: Check scripts in qgis?) – QGIS vector layer

Returns

Converted GeoDataFrame

Return type

geopandas.GeoDataFrame

fracture_analysis_kit_qgis_tools.plotting_directories(results_folder, name)¶

Creates plotting directories and handles FileExistsErrors when raised.

Parameters

  • results_folder (str) – Base folder to create plots_{name} folder to.

  • name (str) – Analysis name.

Returns

Newly made path to plotting directory where all plots will be saved to.

Return type

str
